title: All That He Demands
description: Lily and Connors' story continues...Number three in the "Billionaire's Seduction" series and the sequel to ALL THAT HE WANTS (Part 1) and ALL THAT HE DESIRES (Part 2)!Lily was worried that the tall, dark, and impossibly handsome stranger wasn't exactly who he pretended to be.She was right.He's even better.What began as a torrid one-night stand threatens to take over Lily's life, as Connor not only reveals a darker side of himself, but tempts her with a world of wealth and privilege.More than lust, more than desire, more than money or fame, Lily wants one thing above all else.But before Connor will give it to her, he will push her boundaries, her limits...and her pleasure...to places she's never imagined.
author: Olivia Thorne
